bibl.title: The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen. (Ancient Judaism and Early Christianity. 59.)
bibl.note: 29 contributions: I. Judaism & Egypt; - II. Early Christianity & Egypt; - III. Gnosticism & Egypt. - Pp. ix-xii: A.H. and G.H.v.K., Preface; - 537-543: Bibliography of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen; - 549-557: Indexes.
HILHORST Anthony and George H. VAN KOOTEN (Edd.), The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen. (Ancient Judaism and Early Christianity. 59.)
Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2005, 8°, xii-557 pp., 1 portrait en front., figg. ISBN 90-04-14425-0. €128.
130 Luttikhuizen Gerard P. 170 Luttikhuizen Gerard P.
